downloadTitle: Microsoft Office Live Meeting Scenario User Guides
downloadDescription: These quick reference guides provide easy to follow steps to use the Office Live Meeting Service.
detailsSection:
These guides provide easy to follow steps for the Office Live Meeting Service covering the following topics:
Break Out Rooms, Creating and Managing Tests, Creating Recordings, Downloading and Viewing Recordings, Managing Combined Telephone and Computer Audio, Presenter Tips, Recording Using the Organizer Recording Panel, Windows Meeting Client vs Web Console, Best Practices for Office Live Meeting Video, Fast Meet Now on the Live Meeting service via Office Communicator, Controlling Electronic Communications, and an Audio Options Matrix.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following Office applications:
    • Microsoft Office Word 2007
    • WinZip
    • Adobe Acrobat Reader
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:

Save the file to a directory on your computer.

Instructions for use:

After you save the file, open the document as you typically would.

To remove this download:

Delete the file from the directory where you saved it.
